14090.「……ククク。そうだったのか。\n この修行をこなすとは やはり\n お前は ポ:
Hmm hmm hmm...I get it now.
Training as you are must mean you
are a student of Polfan after all.

14091.「オレも かつては あいつの弟子だった。\n 言うなれば お前の兄弟子ってとこだ:
I used to be a student of his, you know.
In a way, that makes me your senior.

14092.「知ってるか？ <pc>。\n この修行をこなした奴だけが\n 伝説の旅芸人に:
Only those who complete this training can
grow ever closer to becoming a legendary
minstrel. Did you know that?

14093.「オレも 修行を終えたところだ。\n あの時は勝ちをゆずったが 今 この時におい:
I've just finished my training as well.
I let you win last time, but as of now...
you and I stand as equals.

14094.「フハハ！ オレは 誰にも止められねえ！\n いずれ最強となり 世の中から恐れら:
Hahaha! None can stop me! I'll become the
most powerful and legendary minstrel ever
knownーthe whole world shall fear me!

14095.「人を笑わせるだけで 満足してるような\n ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！:
I'll kill any minstrel who thinks a laugh
is enough! The world will know just how
useless their "tricks" really are!

14097.「頭に たたきこんでおけ。<pc>。\n ポルファンは 人ひとり救えねえ クズ芸:
Get this into your head, <pc>.
Polfan is a hack who is incapable of
saving ANYONE.
